verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Cross of Christ lead onward
Through the Holy War
in this sign we conquer
now and evermore

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Not a of man the power
not to man the fame
we are victors only
In our Leader's name

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Cross of Christ lead onward
Through the Holy War
In this sign we conquer
Now and evermore

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Not with pomp and pageant
Not in earthly pride
We must fight our battles
like the crucifued

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
overcome by suffering
conquer through defeat
tried and tested daily
in the furnace heat

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Panoplied in graces
Bold yet humbly meek
resting while we are working
strong but ever weak

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
timid though couragous
gaining as we give
crucified with Jesus
yet in Him we live

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
By a cloud encompassed
witnesses above
Saints Apostles Prophets
precious ones we love

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
while 'advance' is sounding
mounts the battle thrill
cross of Christ lead onward
where the Captain will

verse.name: v5a
verse.lines:
Marching in the pathway
that the Master trod
walks One daily with us
like the Son of God

verse.name: v5b
verse.lines:
To the end enduring
Armor ne'er laid down
til the cross leads upward
to the blood-bought Crown
